name: trio blanket
sizes_available: • sample a blanket: 33” x 64” (84cm x 162cm) • sample b blanket: 38” x 50” (97cm x 128cm)
notes:
this pattern can be found for free on my blog [here][1]. the dutch translation is also available there.

an ad-free, print-friendly pdf can be found in us terms, uk terms, and french on etsy [here][2].

the trio blanket is aptly named because it's worked with three complete cakes of scheepjes whirl. sit back and enjoy working this simple and rhythmic pattern while letting the yarn do all of the astounding color-work. there are only 6 ends to weave as the color changes are brought up the sides.

colors used for the two samples are detailed in the pattern and on my blog, but you can make it in any 3 colors of your choice.

**dimensions:** 
sample a: 33" x 64" (84cm x 162cm)
sample b: 38" x 50" (97cm x 128cm)

**hook:** 3.5mm (e)

**stitches used (us terms):** ch, hdc, dc

**skill level:** easy

**languages:** us (free on blog and pdf), uk (pdf only), dutch (free on blog only), symbol chart.

due to the nature of patterns, this pattern may not be returned or exchanged. all sales are final. this pattern may not be redistributed or copied in any way.

when you purchase $16.50 worth of patterns, enter code esave3 at checkout on etsy for a $3 savings.

finished items may be sold, i just ask that you give credit to me, susan carlson at feltedbutton.com for the pattern.
